text: Ya that was our second option. Thanks for the tips!

Bumping this before I create a new module:

It looks like this default module:
```{% dnd_module
          path='@HubSpot/linked_image',
          img={
          "src" : "<https://f.HubSpotusercontent30.net/hubfs/xxxxxxx/dnd-template/art/homepage-hero-art-1.svg>",
          "alt" : "xxxx",
          "width" : 575,
          "height" : 400
          }
        %}
        {% end_dnd_module %}%}```
should set the height of the `<img>` element that it generates but it does not. Is that a bug? Should I make my own module or is there a better default option?
